AdvTriangle - Class in fast3d.renderables
an advanced version of triangle3d that is illuminatable with any built-in light
getColor() returns the current visible color
AdvTriangle(Vector3d, Vector3d, Vector3d, Vector3d) - Constructor for class fast3d.renderables.AdvTriangle
call the super constructor
sets a custom normal vector for lighting calculation
for correct lighting the normal vector should be orthogonal to this and normalized
to set ambient, diffuse and specular light colors and the shininess, direct access to the fields is permitted
AdvTriangle(Vector3d, Vector3d, Vector3d) - Constructor for class fast3d.renderables.AdvTriangle
calls this constructor, the normal vector will be orthogonal to this and normalized
normal vector as the one of triangle3d
AdvTriangle(Vector3d, Vector3d, Vector3d, Color, Color, Color, Color, double, Vector3d) - Constructor for class fast3d.renderables.AdvTriangle
call the super constructor
sets a custom normal vector for lighting calculation
for correct lighting the normal vector should be orthogonal to this and normalized
AdvTriangle(Vector3d, Vector3d, Vector3d, Material) - Constructor for class fast3d.renderables.AdvTriangle
call this constructor
the normal vector will be orthogonal to this and normalized
AdvTriangle(Vector3d, Vector3d, Vector3d, Material, Vector3d) - Constructor for class fast3d.renderables.AdvTriangle
call the super constructor
sets a custom normal vector for lighting calculation
for correct lighting the normal vector should be orthogonal to this and normalized
allowNegativeRotX - Variable in class fast3d.simple.controls.RotationControl
whether to allow the user looking down until -maxRotX
means rotation over the x-z-plate
default false
allowPositiveRotX - Variable in class fast3d.simple.controls.RotationControl
whether to allow the user looking up until maxRotX
means rotation under the x-z-plate
default false
alpha - Variable in class fast3d.complex.light.Material
the alpha-component of the colors is not respected due to illumination has to be on solid surfaces - this alpha is applied to the visible color as result of the lighting-calculation
opaque is 1d, transparent is 0d
alpha() - Method in class fast3d.graphics.Color
an alpha value of 1 means opaque and 0 means transparent
ambient - Variable in class fast3d.complex.light.Material
the color used to illuminate with ambient light (background-light)
AmbientLight - Class in fast3d.complex.light
ambient light means background-light or the minimum light that is even in the shadows
AmbientLight(Color) - Constructor for class fast3d.complex.light.AmbientLight
constructs some ambient lighting with the given color
analyze(Point, Point) - Static method in class fast3d.util.math.RelationshipAnalytics
compares the position of the points
if they are equal result will be identical otherwise parallel
analyze(Straight, Point) - Static method in class fast3d.util.math.RelationshipAnalytics
compares the position of the point to the straight
if the point is on the straight result will be intersecting otherwise parallel
analyze(Plate, Point, double) - Static method in class fast3d.util.math.RelationshipAnalytics
compares the position of the point to the plate
if the point is on the plate result will be intersecting otherwise parallel
analyze(Plate, Point) - Static method in class fast3d.util.math.RelationshipAnalytics
a wrapper to analyze(a,b,0.0); with zeroLockControl disabled
analyze(Straight, Straight, double) - Static method in class fast3d.util.math.RelationshipAnalytics
compares the two straights a and b
if they are ... result will be ...: askew : ASKEW identical : IDENTICAL real-parallel : PARALLEL intersecting : INTERSECTING
analyze(Straight, Straight) - Static method in class fast3d.util.math.RelationshipAnalytics
a wrapper to analyze(a,b,0.0); with zeroLockControl disabled
analyze(Plate, Straight, double) - Static method in class fast3d.util.math.RelationshipAnalytics
compares the straight and plate
if ... the result will be ...: the plate contains the straight : INCIDENT the straight is real-parallel to the plate : PARALLEL the straight intersects the plate : INTERSECTING
analyze(Plate, Straight) - Static method in class fast3d.util.math.RelationshipAnalytics
a wrapper to analyze(a,b,0.0); with zeroLockControl disabled
analyze(Plate, Plate, double) - Static method in class fast3d.util.math.RelationshipAnalytics
compares the plates
if ... the result will be ...: the plates are equal : IDENTICAL the plates are real-parallel : PARALLEL the first plate intersects the second plate (or vice versa) : INTERSECTING
analyze(Plate, Plate) - Static method in class fast3d.util.math.RelationshipAnalytics
a wrapper to analyze(a,b,0.0); with zeroLockControl disabled
analyzeGeneral(GeometricObject, GeometricObject) - Static method in class fast3d.util.math.RelationshipAnalytics
a wrapper to analyze(GeometricalObject,GeometricalObject,0.0) with zeroLockControl disabled
analyzeGeneral(GeometricObject, GeometricObject, double) - Static method in class fast3d.util.math.RelationshipAnalytics
a wrapper around all other analyze methods casting automatically points, straights and triangles/plates
angle() - Method in class fast3d.math.Vector2d
 
angleTo(Vector2d) - Method in class fast3d.math.Vector2d
calculates the angle between this and the parameter-vector in radiant
both vectors are direction-vectors and for that calculation interpreted as arrows laying on the 3d-space-origin
does not change the parameter
angleTo(Vector3d) - Method in class fast3d.math.Vector3d
calculates the angle between this and the parameter-vector in radiant
both vectors are direction-vectors and for that calculation interpreted as arrows laying on the 3d-space-origin
does not change the parameter
angleTo(Vector4d) - Method in class fast3d.math.Vector4d
calculates the angle between this and the parameter-vector in radiant
both vectors are direction-vectors and for that calculation interpreted as arrows laying on the 4d-space-origin
does not change the parameter
applyAcceleration(Vector3d) - Method in class fast3d.util.AVec
adds the acceleration not considering the mass of this
applyAspectRatioHpW(double) - Method in class fast3d.math.Camera
scales the 3d virtual screen to the given aspect ratio at a normalized width and scaled height
if used right this method is equal to applyAspectRatio(1d/heightPerWidth);
it is preferred to use the width/height version because modern screens have a bigger width than height and if this method is used some of the bottom parts of the image are cut off (unless by using the other version some right parts of the image are cut off - on smartphones in portrait mode this method version is eventually the better choice)
applyAspectRatioWpH(double) - Method in class fast3d.math.Camera
scales the 3d virtual screen to the given aspect ratio at a normalized height and scaled width
applyChanges() - Method in class fast3d.control.Control
applies the changes caused by the input to the universe if the control is activated
applyForce(Vector3d) - Method in class fast3d.util.AVec
adds the force to what is to move
asyncPreRender() - Method in class fast3d.Panel3d
called on repaint() to perform changes on the Universe that are not synchronous to the render-process
audioPlayer(String) - Static method in class fast3d.util.SimpleAudio
a wrapper around audioPlayer(File,double,double)
skip at begin and end will be 0.0 seconds
because the result-thread will do various I/O interrupt() will not work
audioPlayer(File, double, double) - Static method in class fast3d.util.SimpleAudio
returns a thread doing the I/O for passing the data from a AudioInputStream upon the given file to a sourceDataLine for playback on the primary mixer
because the result-thread will do various I/O interrupt() will not work
auto_rotPerSecond - Variable in class fast3d.simple.controls.RotationControl
the automated rotation speed around the y-axis in radiant per second
default is 0 meaning auto-rotation disabled
AVec - Class in fast3d.util
a very simple call providing the basics to simulate accelerated movement
AVec() - Constructor for class fast3d.util.AVec
constructs a new accelerated movement at position (0,0,0) with mass 1 standing still
AVec(double) - Constructor for class fast3d.util.AVec
constructs a new accelerated movement at position (0,0,0) standing still
AVec(Vector3d) - Constructor for class fast3d.util.AVec
constructs a new accelerated movement with mass of 1d standing still
AVec(Vector3d, double) - Constructor for class fast3d.util.AVec
constructs a new accelerated movement standing still
awt_modifiers - Variable in class fast3d.renderables.Callout.Text
